info.name: Calming Cube
info.description:
Here's a little cube for your viewing pleasure. [url=https://www.shadertoy.com/view/7dsBRB]Based on this shader.[/url]

[url=https://www.shadertoy.com/playlist/fXlGDN]<300 chars playlist[/url]

renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4
O,vec2 C) {O-=O;vec3 q=
iResolution,d=(vec3(C+C
,q)-q)/q.x*.5,p=-3./q;q
-=q;for(float i=0.,s; i
++<2e2; int(i)% 3>1? s=
length(--q.xz),q=p+=d*s
,O+=.7/exp(s-s*d.zyyz)/
i,q.yz*=mat2(cos(iTime*
.3+vec4(0,33,11,0))),q=
abs(q):q=q.x< q.y? q.z\
xy:q.zyx);O.rgb *=++d;}
renderpass.name: Image
